member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLightMode
member.summary: Defines the operating mode for the TrafficLight control. Numeric: Control expects a numeric Value and automatically calculates status based on boundaries. String: Control expects a direct status string value (Green, Yellow, or Red).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLightMode.Numeric
member.summary: Numeric mode: Calculate status from Value and boundaries (GreenUpperBound, YellowUpperBound).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLightMode.String
member.summary: String mode: Use direct status value from Status property.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight
member.summary: Traffic light indicator control that displays status based on numeric values with customizable color boundaries. Automatically calculates color (Green, Yellow, Red) based on value and threshold settings. Includes auto-generated accessibility tooltip showing the color name. Suitable for use in DataGrids, lists, and any layout requiring visual status indication. Follows Avalonia control patterns with full StyledProperty support for styling and templating.

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.ModeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the operating mode for the control. Numeric (default): Expects a numeric Value and calculates status from boundaries. String: Expects a direct status value (Green, Yellow, Red).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.StatusProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the direct status value when Mode is String. When Mode is Numeric, this property is ignored; use Value instead. Expected values: "Green", "Yellow", "Red" (case-insensitive parsing supported).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.ValueProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the numeric value to evaluate for color determination. Only used when Mode is Numeric. The control automatically calculates status based on this value and boundary properties.

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.GreenUpperBoundProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper boundary for Green status (0 to GreenUpperBound = Green). Default: 50 (meaning 0-50 is Green, 50-85 is Yellow, 85+ is Red).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.YellowUpperBoundProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper boundary for Yellow status (GreenUpperBound to YellowUpperBound = Yellow). Default: 85 (meaning values 50-85 are Yellow, 85+ are Red).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.SymbolProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the visual symbol/indicator displayed in the center.

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.GreenBrushProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the color brush used when status is Green (value ≤ GreenUpperBound).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.YellowBrushProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the color brush used when status is Yellow/Warning (GreenUpperBound < value ≤ YellowUpperBound).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.RedBrushProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the color brush used when status is Red/Error (value > YellowUpperBound).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.SizeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the size (diameter) of the indicator circle.

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.SymbolFontSizeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the symbol text.

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.CalculatedStatusProperty
member.summary: Gets the calculated traffic light status based on the current value and boundaries. Read-only, automatically updated when Value, GreenUpperBound, or YellowUpperBound changes.

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.ColorNameProperty
member.summary: Gets the current color name (Green, Yellow, or Red) for accessibility purposes. Read-only, automatically updated based on CalculatedStatus.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.RecalculateStatus
member.summary: Recalculates the traffic light status based on current mode and property values. In Numeric mode: Automatically calculates status from Value and boundaries. In String mode: Parses and uses the Status property directly. Automatically updates CalculatedStatus and ColorName properties.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.CalculateStatus(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Determines the traffic light status based on the provided value and boundaries.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.GetColorName(GRC.Shared.UI.Enums.TrafficLightStatus)
member.summary: Returns the human-readable color name for accessibility purposes.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Controls.TrafficLight.InitializeComponent(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Wires up the controls and optionally loads XAML markup and attaches dev tools (if Avalonia.Diagnostics package is referenced).
member.param: Should the XAML be loaded into the component.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.BoolToThemeResourceBrushConverter
member.summary: Converts boolean values to theme-aware brushes via resource key lookup.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.CurrencyDisplayConverter
member.summary: Formats a monetary value using the provided currency code and the shared currency helper.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.DateTimeOffsetToDateTimeConverter
member.summary: Converts DateTimeOffset and DateTime values to normalized DateTime (date-only, unspecified kind).

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.InverseBooleanConverter
member.summary: Inverts boolean values for binding scenarios where negation is needed. Commonly used for IsEnabled inversions (e.g., disable button while operation is running).

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.NumericConverter
member.summary: Converts between numeric types (int, decimal, double) and their string representations. Supports culture-aware parsing and handles nullable numeric types.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.PercentageOfSizeConverter
member.summary: Multiplies size values by percentage factors for proportional layout bindings.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.ToastTypeToBrushConverter
member.summary: Converts ToastType enum values to brushes for toast notification styling. Supports Success (green), Warning (orange), and Error (red) severity levels.

member.name: P:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.ToastTypeToBrushConverter.SuccessBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used for success toast notifications.

member.name: P:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.ToastTypeToBrushConverter.WarningBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used for warning toast notifications.

member.name: P:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.ToastTypeToBrushConverter.ErrorBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used for error toast notifications.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.ToastTypeToBrushConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a ToastType to the corresponding brush.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.ToastTypeToBrushConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Not implemented - conversion is one-way only.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.TrafficLightStatusToBrushConverter
member.summary: Converts TrafficLightStatus enum values to appropriate foreground/border color brushes. Uses theme-aware colors: Green (success), Yellow (warning), Red (error).

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Converters.TrafficLightStatusToLightBrushConverter
member.summary: Converts TrafficLightStatus enum values to background brush (lighter shade for readability).

member.summary: Indicates a yellow status (warning/caution condition).

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Enums.TrafficLightStatus.Red
member.summary: Indicates a red status (negative/critical condition).

member.summary: Generic refresh target for data collection updates.

member.name: F:GRC.Shared.UI.Messages.RefreshTargets.UiState

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Messages.RefreshViewMessage

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the refresh request is for all listeners.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Messages.RefreshViewMessage.Matches(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the refresh request applies to the provided target.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.BaseDialogService
member.summary: Base implementation for modal dialog orchestration with focus management and dialog stacking. Derived classes can customize modal options and nested dialog behavior.

member.name: P:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.BaseDialogService.CurrentDialog
member.summary: Gets the currently active dialog, or null if stack is empty.

member.summary: Initializes base dialog service with message handling for CloseDialogMessage.

member.summary: Displays a modal dialog for the given view model.

member.summary: Builds the view for the given view model using the view locator.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.BaseDialogService.GetModalDialogOptions
member.summary: Returns modal dialog options for session creation. Override to customize layout and sizing behavior.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.BaseDialogService.OnDialogOpening(Avalonia.Controls.Window,Avalonia.Controls.Window,Avalonia.Controls.Window,GRC.Shared.UI.Dialogs.ModalDialogOptions)
member.summary: Called after dialog is pushed to stack but before showing. Handles owner/previous dialog disabling and focus capture.
member.param: The dialog about to be shown.
The main window owner.
The previously active dialog, or null if this is top-level.
Modal dialog options for the session.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.BaseDialogService.OnDialogClosing(Avalonia.Controls.Window,Avalonia.Controls.Window,GRC.Shared.UI.Services.BaseDialogService.DialogFocusState,GRC.Shared.UI.Dialogs.ModalDialogOptions)
member.summary: Called when dialog is closing. Restores owner/previous dialog state and focus.
member.param: The dialog being closed.
The main window owner.
Captured focus state for restoration.
Modal dialog options for the session.

member.name: T:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.BaseDialogService.DialogFocusState
member.summary: Captures dialog focus state for restoration after closure.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.FilePickerService.OpenFileAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Displays an open file dialog and returns the selected file path, if any.
member.param: Dialog title shown to the user.
Default file extension to use when the picker does not provide one.
Optional filter patterns to restrict selectable files.
member.returns: The absolute path to the selected file, or null when the dialog is cancelled.

member.name: M:GRC.Shared.UI.Services.FilePickerService.SaveFileAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Displays a save file dialog and returns the chosen destination path.
member.param: Suggested file name shown to the user.
Dialog title shown to the user.
Default file extension to append when the user omits one.
Optional filter patterns to restrict selectable files.
Optional initial directory to open when the dialog starts.
member.returns: The absolute path selected by the user, or null when the dialog is cancelled.
